00031   class Graph {

00037     typedef unsigned int vertex_descriptor;
00038     typedef std::pair<vertex_descriptor, vertex_descriptor>
00039     edge_descriptor;
00040     
00041     typedef std::set<vertex_descriptor>::iterator adjacency_iterator;
00042 
00043     typedef std::size_t vertices_size_type;
00044     typedef std::size_t edges_size_type;

00046   public:
00047 
00048     // ---------
00049     // viterator
00050     // ---------
00051 
00057     class vertex_iterator {
00058     private:
00059       vertex_descriptor pos;
00060     public:
00061       vertex_iterator(vertex_descriptor pos) {
00062         this->pos = pos;
00063       }
00064 
00065       vertex_iterator operator ++ () {
00066         ++pos;
00067         return *this;
00068       }
00069 
00070       vertex_iterator operator ++ (int) {
00071         vertex_iterator tmp(*this);
00072         pos++;
00073         return tmp;
00074       }
00075 
00076       vertex_descriptor operator * () {
00077         return pos;
00078       }
00079 
00080       bool operator != (const vertex_iterator& rhs) {
00081         return pos != rhs.pos;
00082       }
00083     };
00084 
00085     // a helper struct to call the edge_iterator constructor for beginning and the end
00086 
00087     struct end_tag {};
00088     struct start_tag {};
00089 
00093     class edge_iterator {
00094     private:
00095       const Graph* thegraph;
00096       vertex_iterator vpos;
00097       std::set<vertex_descriptor>::iterator epos;
00098       std::set<vertex_descriptor> empty_set; // if the graph is empty 
00099       // we need a dummy empty set
00100     public:
00101      //constructor for begin() of all the edges
00102       edge_iterator(const Graph* g, start_tag) : thegraph(g), vpos(vertex_iterator(0)) {
00103         if(!( thegraph->g.empty()) ) epos = thegraph->g[*vpos].begin();
00104         else epos = empty_set.begin();
00105       }
00106      //constructor for end() of all the edges
00107       edge_iterator(const Graph* g, end_tag) : thegraph(g),
00108                                                vpos(vertex_iterator(thegraph->g.size() - 1)) {     
00109         if(!( thegraph->g.empty()) ) epos = thegraph->g[*vpos].end();
00110         else epos = empty_set.end();
00111       }
00112       edge_iterator operator ++ () {
00113         if(epos == thegraph->g[*vpos].end()) {
00114           vpos++;
00115           epos = thegraph->g[*vpos].begin();
00116         }
00117         else {
00118           epos++;
00119         }
00120         return *this;
00121       }
00122 
00123       edge_iterator operator ++ (int) {
00124         edge_iterator tmp = *this;
00125         ++(*this);
00126         return tmp;
00127       }
00128 
00129       edge_descriptor operator * () {
00130         return edge_descriptor(*vpos, *epos);
00131       }
00132 
00133       bool operator != (const edge_iterator& rhs) {
00134         if(this == &rhs)
00135           return false;
00136         else
00137           return epos != rhs.epos || vpos != rhs.vpos ||
00138             thegraph != rhs.thegraph;
00139       }
00140     }; // end edge iterator

00152     friend void remove_edge
00153     (vertex_descriptor u, vertex_descriptor v, Graph& myG) {
00154       myG.g[u].erase(v);
00155     }
00156 
00157     // --------
00158     // add_edge
00159     // --------
00160 
00169     friend std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool>
00170     add_edge (vertex_descriptor x, vertex_descriptor y, Graph& myG) {
00171       bool            b = myG.g[x].insert(y).second;
00172       edge_descriptor ed(x,y);// = std::make_pair(a,b);
00173       return std::make_pair(ed, b);
00174     }
00175 
00176     // ----------
00177     // add_vertex
00178     // ----------
00179         
00186     friend vertex_descriptor
00187     add_vertex (Graph& myG) {
00188       myG.g.push_back( std::set<vertex_descriptor>() );
00189       return myG.ind++;
00190     }
00191         
00192     // -----------------
00193     // adjacent_vertices
00194     // -----------------
00195         
00204     friend std::pair<adjacency_iterator, adjacency_iterator>
00205     adjacent_vertices (vertex_descriptor x, const Graph& myG) {
00206       adjacency_iterator b = myG.g[x].begin();
00207       adjacency_iterator e = myG.g[x].end();
00208       return std::make_pair(b, e);
00209     }
00210 
00211     // ----
00212     // edge
00213     // ----
00214         
00220     friend std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool>
00221     edge (vertex_descriptor x, vertex_descriptor y, const Graph& myG) {
00222       assert(x < (myG.ind - 1));
00223       bool            b = myG.g[x].count(y);
00224       edge_descriptor ed(x, y);
00225       return std::make_pair(ed, b);
00226     }
00227 
00228     // -----
00229     // edges
00230     // -----
00231         
00237     friend std::pair<edge_iterator, edge_iterator>
00238     edges (const Graph& mygraph) {
00239       edge_iterator b(&mygraph, start_tag());
00240       edge_iterator e(&mygraph, end_tag());
00241       return std::make_pair(b, e);
00242     }

00244     // ------
00245     // vertex
00246     // ------
00247         
00254     friend vertex_descriptor
00255     vertex (vertices_size_type n, const Graph& myG) {
00256       assert(n < myG.g.size());
00257       return static_cast<vertex_descriptor>(n);
00258     }
00259 
00260     // --------
00261     // vertices
00262     // --------
00263         
00270     friend std::pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator>
00271     vertices (const Graph& mygraph) {
00272       vertex_iterator b(0);
00273       vertex_iterator e(mygraph.g.size() - 1);
00274       return std::make_pair(b, e);
00275     }
00276 
00277     // ------
00278     // source
00279     // ------
00280         
00286     friend vertex_descriptor
00287     source (edge_descriptor x, const Graph& myG) {
00288       assert(x.first < myG.g.size() );
00289       return x.first;
00290     }
00291 
00292     // ------
00293     // target
00294     // ------
00295         
00301     friend vertex_descriptor
00302     target (edge_descriptor x, const Graph& myG) {
00303       return x.second;
00304     }

00306     // ---------
00307     // num_edges
00308     // ---------
00309         
00315     friend edges_size_type
00316     num_edges (const Graph& myG) {
00317       edges_size_type num = 0;
00318       for(unsigned int i = 0; i< myG.g.size(); ++i) {
00319         num += myG.g[i].size();
00320       }
00321       return num;
00322     }
00323 
00324     // ------------
00325     // num_vertices
00326     // ------------
00327         
00333     friend vertices_size_type
00334     num_vertices (const Graph& myG) {
00335       return static_cast<vertices_size_type>(myG.g.size());
00336     }

00345     std::vector< std::set<vertex_descriptor> > g;
00346     vertex_descriptor ind; //the end index of a graph
00347     // -----
00348     // valid
00349     // -----
00350 
00354     bool valid () const {
00355       return ind == g.size();
00356     }
